SO DON'T BELIEVE ALL THE BAD REVEIWS OF OSTEOPOROSIS DRUGS-MOST OF THESE ARE BEING WRITTEN BY WOMEN WITH MANY OTHER HEALTH ISSUES AND/OR ARE SENSITIVE TO MOST MEDICATIONS IT SEEMS.
